sections.heading: debtors not originally summoned made judgment debtors
sections.text: When a judgment is recovered against one or more persons jointly indebted upon contract, those who were not originally summoned may be made parties to the judgment by action.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 471, p. 472;R.S.1913, ยง 8039;C.S.1922, ยง 8980;C.S
